name: Stomach
specification: Plastic, life-size, with detachable front half for detailed cross-sectional study of stomach layers, vessels, nerves, and mucosa.
function: Displays the anatomical structure and function of the stomach, including its role in digestion and nutrient processing.
usage: Handle carefully during demonstrations; use detachable parts to explore internal anatomy; ideal for teaching and self-learning.
maintenance: Store in dry place; clean gently; avoid dropping or rough handling to prevent damage.
warning: Excessive force or dropping may crack or damage anatomical sections.
